reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Thompson's lectures are engaging and informative. She makes complex topics easy to understand.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant professor! His passion for coding is contagious. Challenging but rewarding classes.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Interesting material, but lectures can be a bit disorganized. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Williams brings history to life with his storytelling. Assignments are thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Excellent teacher! Dr. Rodriguez explains complex concepts clearly and is always willing to help.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Difficult to follow in class. Concepts aren't explained well, and there's little support outside of lectures.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Lee's passion for literature is evident. Discussions are lively and insightful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Brilliant physicist and educator. Makes complex theories accessible and interesting.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Interesting course content, but lectures can be dry. Dr. Garcia is knowledgeable but not very engaging.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson relates economic theories to real-world situations effectively. Challenging but fair exams.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's enthusiasm for art is infectious. Her lectures are like guided tours through time.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Lectures are confusing and abstract. Prof. Anderson seems disinterested in student questions.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Dr. Patel brings current environmental issues into focus. Field trips are a highlight of the course.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Knowledgeable professor, but can be biased in presentations. Encourages debate, which is good.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Dr. Green makes language study fascinating and accessible.

reviews.subject: Business Administration
reviews.review: Prof. Lee brings real-world experience to the classroom. Practical and informative lectures.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter, but Dr. White's teaching style can be a bit monotonous.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien is a musical genius. His passion for music theory is inspiring and contagious.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez explains complex brain functions clearly. Labs are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Lectures are hard to follow. Prof. Clark moves too quickly through difficult concepts.
